product_name: Pearl Izumi Select SL Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The women's sleeveless Select SL Jersey from Pearl Izumi combines great style with technical fabric and 2 back pockets to create a perfect all-around cycling jersey. Select Transfer Dry fabric excels at wicking moisture, dries quickly and offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Full-length zipper gives you venting options. Reflective elements enhance visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi Select SL Jersey for women features 2 rear drop-in pockets.
short_description: The women's sleeveless Select SL Jersey from Pearl Izumi combines great style with technical fabric and 2 back pockets to create a perfect all-around cycling jersey.
